languages.text:
{n}Из вокса, закрепленного на броне Хальбрандта, звучат гулкие барабаны.{/n}
"В темный час запирает двери
Тот, кто боится гостей незваных,
Тот, чьи помыслы скверной полны,
Тот, кто расплаты за грех страшится..."

{n}Booming drums sound from the vox mounted on Halbrandt's armour.{/n}
"In hour dark,
He bars the doors,
He who fears
guests unbidden,
He who fosters
purpose tainted,
He who dreads
his reckoning..."
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
{n}哈尔布兰特盔甲上的音阵装置猛然响了起来。{/n}
“在那黑暗的时刻，
他闩住了大门。
他惧怕着，
那些不速之客。
他滋长着，
那些邪恶目的。
他恐惧着，
他的审判之刻……”
languages.original_text:
{n}Booming drums sound from the vox mounted on Halbrandt's armour.{/n}
"In hour dark,
He bars the doors,
He who fears
guests unbidden,
He who fosters
purpose tainted,
He who dreads
his reckoning..."

traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text:
{n}ハルブラントのアーマーに装着したヴォクスからドラム音がとどろく。{/n}
「暗闇の刻、
戸締まりをする者は誰か、
招かれざる客を
心配する者、
汚らわしき決意を
胸に抱く者、
己に降る罰を
恐れる者…」
languages.original_text:
{n}Booming drums sound from the vox mounted on Halbrandt's armour.{/n}
"In hour dark,
He bars the doors,
He who fears
guests unbidden,
He who fosters
purpose tainted,
He who dreads
his reckoning..."

languages.text:
{n}Des percussions tonitruantes jaillissent du vox monté sur l'armure d'Halbrandt.{/n}
« Quand vient la nuit,
il condamne sa porte,
lui qui redoute
les visiteurs indésirables,
lui qui nourrit,
des desseins coupables,
lui qui craint,
l'heure de son jugement... »
languages.original_text:
{n}Booming drums sound from the vox mounted on Halbrandt's armour.{/n}
"In hour dark,
He bars the doors,
He who fears
guests unbidden,
He who fosters
purpose tainted,
He who dreads
his reckoning..."

languages.text:
{n}Dröhnende Trommeln ertönen aus dem Vox an Halbrandts Rüstung.{/n}
"In dunkler Stunde
verriegelt die Türen,
wer Angst hat
vor ungebetenen Gästen,
wer böse Absichten
in sich hegt,
wer befürchtet,
dass die Abrechnung naht ..."
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
{n}Halbrandt'ın zırhındaki vokstan gümleyen davul sesleri geliyor.{/n}
"Gece çöktüğünde
Kapılarını kapatır,
Görünce davetsiz birini
Aklını yitirendir o.
İstekle destekler
Lekeli amacı,
Kıyamet vakti gelince
Korkup kaçandır o..."
languages.original_text:
{n}Booming drums sound from the vox mounted on Halbrandt's armour.{/n}
"In hour dark,
He bars the doors,
He who fears
guests unbidden,
He who fosters
purpose tainted,
He who dreads
his reckoning..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Halbrandt'ın zırhındaki vokstan gümleyen davul sesleri geliyor.{/n}
"En kara zamanda
kapıları kapatıyor.
Davetsiz misafirlerden,
ürkendir o.
Lekelenen amacı,
destekleyendir o.
Kıyametinden
korkandır o..."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine
